title: People-Pleasing Recovery
subtitle: Stop abandoning yourself for others' approval
description: People-pleasing is a survival strategy that costs you your life. This course helps you understand why you do it, what you're really afraid of, and how to start choosing yourself without becoming selfish or alone.

modules.title: Understanding People-Pleasing
modules.description: What it is, why you do it, and what it costs

modules.title: The Fear Beneath
modules.description: What you're really afraid will happen

modules.title: Learning to Choose Yourself
modules.description: Practical steps for prioritizing your needs

modules.title: Handling Others' Reactions
modules.description: What to do when people don't like the new you

modules.title: Sustainable Change
modules.description: Building a life that includes your own needs

whatYouLearn: Understand the people-pleasing pattern and its costs
Recognize how it developed as a survival strategy
Face the fears that drive the behavior
Practice choosing yourself in practical ways
requirements: Recognition that you have a people-pleasing pattern
Boundaries course helpful but not required

questions.question: What is people-pleasing at its core?
options: Abandoning your own needs to manage others' emotions or perceptions

questions.question: How does people-pleasing typically develop?
options: Being too nice as a child
As a survival strategy when approval was conditional or conflict was dangerous

questions.question: What fear typically drives people-pleasing?
options: Fear of rejection, abandonment, conflict, or being seen as bad/selfish

questions.question: What does 'choosing yourself' involve?
options: Including your needs in decisions, saying no when needed, and not abandoning yourself for approval

questions.question: What happens when you stop people-pleasing?
options: Some people may react negatively, especially those who benefited from your pattern

questions.question: Is it possible to be kind without people-pleasing?
options: Yes - genuine kindness includes yourself and isn't driven by fear
You have to choose one or the other
